Aula dia 06/04/2018
Precisa de 300 host por sub-rede. 
Apenas quando o caso щ host se diminui 2 bites.
300 host serс necessario 9 bites.
Ip 172.16.0.0 / Classe B.
10101100.00010000.00000000.00000000

Mascara de SubRede:
11111111.11111111.11111110.00000000 = 255.255.254.0

BroadCast toda parte que representa o Host щ preenchida com 1
e a porчуo representa a rede fica igual.

Sub-Redes:           
1А SubRede = 10101100.00010000.0000000.00000000
SubRede: 172.16.0.0

2А SubRede = 10101100.00010000.00000010.00000000
SubRede: 172.16.2.0

3А SubRede = 10101100.00010000.00000110.00000000
SubRede: 172.16.6.0

10А SubRede = 10101100.00010000.00010010.00000000
SubRede: 172.16.18.0

NА SubRede = 10101100.00010000.11111110.00000000
SubRede: 172.16.254.0

BroadCast: 
1А Broadcast = 10101100.0001000.00000001.11111111
Broadcast: 172.16.1.255

2А Broadcast = 10101100.0001000.00000011.11111111
Broadcast: 172.16.3.255

3А BroadCast = 10101100.0001000.00000111.11111111
Broadcast:172.16.7.255

10А Broadcast = 10101100.0001000.00010011.11111111
BroadCast: 172.16.19.255

NА Broadcast = 10101100.0001000.11111111.11111111
Broadcast: 172.16.255.255

-----------------------------------------------------------
Precisa de 120 host. 7 bites.
Ip: 172.16.0.0 / Classe B
10101100.00010000.00000000.00000000

Mascara de rede:
11111111.11111111.11111111.10000000 = 255.255.255.128
0000000
0000001
0000010

1111101
1111110
1111111


SubRede:
1А 172.16.0.0 = 10101100.00010000.00000000.00000000

2А 172.16.0.128 = 10101100.00010000.00000000.10000000

3А 172.16.1.0 = 10101100.00010000.00000001.00000000

4А 172.16.254.128 = 10101100.00010000.11111110.10000000

5А 172.16.255.0 = 10101100.00010000.11111111.00000000

6А 172.16.255.128 = 10101100.00010000.11111111.10000000

Broadcast
1А 172.16.0.127 = 10101100.00010000.00000000.01111111

2А 172.16.0.255 = 10101100.00010000.00000000.11111111

3А 172.16.1.127 = 10101100.00010000.00000001.01111111

4А 172.16.254.255 = 10101100.00010000.11111110.11111111

5А 172.16.255.127 = 10101100.00010000.11111111.01111111

6А 172.16.255.255 = 10101100.00010000.11111111.1111111
